Game.Name: Backyard Baseball (USA)
Game.plot: Overview:Backyard Baseball is actually the third baseball game in the Backyard Sports franchise by Humongous Entertainment, sharing its name with the original 1997 PC game. It is the first Backyard Baseball game to reach consoles, namely the PlayStation 2, GameCube, and Game Boy Advance, in addition to PC and Mac versions.Characters:Fictional CharactersNo backyard game would be the same without the 30 core players.Jocinda Smith DmitriRonny DobbsMario LunaAchmed KhanTony DelvecchioDimitri PetrovichGretchen HasselhoffLueane LuiKimmy EckmanRicky JohnsonAnnie FrazierMikey ThomasLisa CrocketAmir KhanSally DobbsPete WheelerDante RobinsonVicki KawaguchiReese WorthingtonKenny KawaguchiStephanie MorganSidney WeberAshely Weber KieshaAngela DelvecchioMarky DuboisPablo SanchezBilly Jean BlackwoodJorge GarciaErnie SteeleKiesha Phillips MLB PlayersAlex Rodriguez (Texas Rangers)Albert Pujols (St. Louis Cardinals)Barry Bonds (San Francisco Giants)Bobby Higginson (Detroit Tigers)Brad Radke (Minnesota Twins)Carlos Beltran (Kansas City Royals)Carlos Delgado (Toronto Blue Jays)Chipper Jones (Atlanta Braves)Cliff Floyd (Florida Marlins)Derek Jeter (New York Yankees)Frank Thomas (Chicago White Sox)Greg Vaughn (Tampa Bay Devil Rays)Ichiro Suzuki (Seattle Mariners)Jason Giambi (New York Yankees)Jason Kendall (Pittsburgh Pirates)Jeff Bagwell (Houston Astros)Jeff Conine (Baltimore Orioles)Jim Thome (Cleveland Indians)Jimmy Rollins (Philadelphia Phillies)Ken Griffey Jr. (Cincinnati Reds)Mike Piazza (New York Mets)Nomar Garciaparra (Boston Red Sox)Phil Nevin (San Diego Padres)Randy Johnson (Arizona Diamondbacks)Richie Sexson (Milwaukee Brewers)Sammy Sosa (Chicago Cubs)Shawn Green (Los Angeles Dodgers)Tim Hudson (Oakland Athletics)Todd Helton (Colorado Rockies)Troy Glaus (Anaheim Angels)Vladimir Guerrero (Montreal Expos)Cheat: Aluminum batWhen battling, enter 'POWER' to get an aluminum power bat.Cheat: Extra skill balls for players.Here are special ways to get extra skill balls.1)Kimmy Eckman gets 6 extra for playing at Eckman Arches.2)Amir Khan gets 5 extra for being on Achmed's team.3)Annie Fraizer gets 3 extra for being on a team with an animal for a logo.4)Ernie Steele gets 5 extra for playing at Steele Stadium.5)Sidney and Ashley Webber each get 8 extra if they're on the same team.Cheat: Extra skill balls for players.Whenever you select a player for your team, and he's on the same team in Major League Baseball (ex: You picking Nomar Garciaparra and selecting the Red Sox for your team), that player will recieve a statistics bonus just when you start your first game of the season.
Game.Notes: Create the baseball team of your dreams! It's great baseball action with the backyard kids and real pro players as kids. Pick your team, choose logos and playing fields. Play single games, an entire season or Home Run Derby. It's the chance of a lifetime to play with the pros right in your own backyard. Play single Games or a whole season, choose from all 30 Major League Baseball teams, create, save and trade custom players, practice your swing in the Home Run Derby, and track player and team stats in Season play. Also features a two-player multiplayer mode when linking up two Game Boy Advance units via a link cable.
